meta.title: Golden Retriever Cost in Denver, CO (2025 Price Guide)
meta.description: Complete breakdown of Golden Retriever costs in Denver. Puppy prices, vet bills, grooming, and monthly expenses for Denver dog owners.

h1: How Much Does a Golden Retriever Cost in Denver?
local_insights: Active outdoor lifestyle means higher spend on gear (harnesses, boots).
Vet costs are moderate but emergency care can be pricey.
Many apartments are dog-friendly but may charge pet rent.
